comments:
I am using 3.2M2.  The workbench just shuts down at random times.  I've 
noticed that once or twice it has been triggered while I am trying to drag 
something (though not always, to the best of my recollection).  It doesn't 
crash, but exits as if I had clicked File -> Exit.  If a runtime workbench was 
launched, it keeps running fine.  Upon restart, I see the following in the 
error log:

Warning 2005-10-12 18:04:19.349 A workspace crash was detected. The previous 
session did not exit normally.

But that's it.  No exception trace, no other logs generated.

I just noticed this other error in the log.  Not sure if that was the cause.

Likely a dupe of bug 22456.  Passing to Ahab to determine if this is the whale he's looking for.

I have been running into this problem (the workbench exiting) with a variety 
of scenarios.  See bug 113021, it could be related (although the stack trace 
is different).

We were leaking menus and the stack trace in this bug report reflects it.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22456 ***
